content: A `RadioGroup` allows users to select a single option from a list. It is composed of a `RadioGroup` container and multiple `Radio` components. The orientation can be `vertical` or `horizontal`.
A RadioGroup can be a controlled component. Use the `value` prop to set the selected value and the `onValueChange` event to handle changes.
You can add a `description` to both the group and individual `Radio` items. The group supports validation with the `isInvalid` and `errorMessage` props.
`RadioGroup` has slots like `base`, `wrapper`, and `label`. `Radio` has slots like `base`, `wrapper`, `control` (the circle), and `label`.
RadioGroup is fully accessible, built on native `<input type="radio">` elements, with support for keyboard navigation (arrow keys).
